name: codx
description: Execute recipes to speed your project setup !

scripts.test:coverage: rm -rf coverage/ && bun test:ci && genhtml coverage/lcov.info -o coverage/ && bunx http-server coverage
scripts.bump:patch: bun run version:pre && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && bun run version:post
scripts.bump:minor: bun run version:pre && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && bun run version:post
scripts.bump:major: bun run version:pre && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && bun run version:post
scripts.version:post:generate-cli: bun run generate:cli && git add dist/cli.js
scripts.version:post:generate-schema: bun run generate:json-schema && git add dist/codx-schema.json
scripts.version:post:commit-develop: export VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add package.json && git commit --no-edit -mv$VERSION
scripts.version:post:merge-main: git checkout main && git pull && git merge develop
